title: Introduction to Quantum Mechanics (2nd edition) by David J.Griff
description: This book first teaches learners how to do quantum mechanics, and then provides them with a more insightful discussion of what it means. Fundamental principles are covered, quantum theory presented, and special techniques developed for attacking realistic problems.
